plot:
An eccentric millionaire dies at a manor in Dalarna in Sweden, leaving 
behind three sons and a mistress. One of four parallel stories about 
parents and children. Four sides of Sweden. Four shades of brown. Fuente: IMDb
title: Fyra nyanser av brunt
